{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|石|t1={{qualifier|chemical nomenclature}} non-metal solid|炭|t2=charcoal|ls=ic}}. Also a {{liushu|psc|nocap=y}}, with {{zh-l|炭}} as a phonetic component.
